aside.h3: Preparing students for college in an academically challenging, arts-integrated environment.

article.p: Preparing students for college in an academically challenging, arts-integrated environment.
Students have the opportunity to pursue academic excellence through arts-integrated curriculum, small class sizes, research-based innovations, college preparatory classes, and a high-quality faculty.

Art, Photography & Graphic Design- Our art programs are led by instructors who hold several advanced degrees also highly acclaimed and accomplished in their fields. They possess that rare combination of real-world success and the ability to teach it.

Dance, Drama, Martial Arts, Speech and Debate-Students learn more than how to add numbers or write a sentence. They learn to solve problems, communicate ideas and be sensitive to the world around them. Participation in the performing arts is one of the best ways to develop these abilities.

Vocal, Strings, Winds, Percussion, Piano and Guitar- We believe that music not only addresses some of the behaviors and skills that are necessary for academic success but that it also teaches students to strive for quality in all areas of their lives.

img.br: HFAA is a college preparatory high school focused on the integration of the arts and academics. Our mission is to prepare students for college in an academically challenging, arts-integrated environment.

p.em: Click image to be directed to the Admissions page.

div.h3: Leadership in Arts & Education Award Dinner

li.a: Donate Help us keep the arts alive in our school!
